channel.title: Writing a JavaScript Compiler in Rust Blog
channel.description: Writing a JavaScript Compiler in Rust Blog

item.title: The ECMAScript Specification
item.description: The ECMAScript® 2023 Language Specification details everything about the JavaScript language, so anyone can implement their own JavaScript engine.
item.content:encoded:
The ECMAScript® 2023 Language Specification details everything about the JavaScript language, so anyone can implement their own JavaScript engine.

For a compiler, we will study the following chapters:

  • 5 Notational Conventions
  • 11 ECMAScript Language: Source Text
  • 12 ECMAScript Language: Lexical Grammar
  • 13 - 16 Expressions, Statments, Functions, Classes, Scripts and Modules
  • B Additional ECMAScript Features for Web Browsers
  • C The Strict Mode of ECMAScript

Cover Grammar​

https://v8.dev/blog/understanding-ecmascript-part-3
